changeSet.author: paybridge
changeSet.createView: SELECT m.id as merchant_id, m.name as merchant_name, COUNT(p.id) as total_payments, SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'SUCCEEDED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as successful_payments, SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'FAILED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as failed_payments, SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'SUCCEEDED' THEN p.amount ELSE 0 END) as total_volume, AVG(CASE WHEN p.status = 'SUCCEEDED' THEN p.amount END) as avg_transaction_size, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'SUCCEEDED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(COUNT(p.id), 0) as success_rate FROM merchants m LEFT JOIN payments p ON m.id = p.merchant_id AND p.created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY m.id, m.name

changeSet.author: paybridge
changeSet.createView: SELECT pr.id as provider_id, pr.name as provider_name, pr.display_name, COUNT(p.id) as total_payments, SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'SUCCEEDED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as successful_payments, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'SUCCEEDED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(COUNT(p.id), 0) as success_rate, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (p.updated_at - p.created_at)) * 1000) as avg_processing_time_ms, SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'SUCCEEDED' THEN p.amount ELSE 0 END) as total_volume FROM providers pr LEFT JOIN payments p ON pr.id = p.provider_id AND p.created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY pr.id, pr.name, pr.display_name
